pxchat.net
Interface ClientListener

public interface ClientListener

Together with the WhiteboardClientListener, this interface controls the information flow between the network package, i.e. the Client, and the GUI components.

This interface provides the common methods clientConnect(String) and clientDisconnect() for connection handling. Whenever the socket connects or disconnects, these methods are called.

Furthermore, the ClientListener provides the methods notification(int), notification(int, String), messageReceived(String, String) and userListChanged(HashMap) which are being called when the associated event is received from the server.

Author:
Markus DÃ¶llinger

Method Detail

clientConnect

void clientConnect(java.lang.String remoteAddress)
This method is called after the client successfully connected to the server.

Parameters:
remoteAddress - The address of the server

clientDisconnect

void clientDisconnect()
This method is called when the clients disconnects from the server, either because it closed the connection or the server shut down.

messageReceived

void messageReceived(java.lang.String author,
                     java.lang.String message)
This method is called when a text message is received.

Parameters:
author - The author of the message
message - The message itself

notification

void notification(int type)
This method is called when a generic notification was received. This notification does not contain any variable data like a user name.

Parameters:
type - The type of the notification
See Also:
NotificationFrame

notification

void notification(int type,
                  java.lang.String username)
This method is called when a notification was received. This notification does contain a user name of the client that caused this notification, i.e. he joined or left the chat.

Parameters:
type - The type of the notification
username - The user name of the client that caused the event
See Also:
NotificationFrame

userListChanged

void userListChanged(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> newUserList)
This method is called when the user list changes, i.e. a client connected or disconnected.

Parameters:
newUserList - The new user list, a mapping of session id to user name
